comments: Okay, it,s not the greatest experience, but it does the job well enough. The reason I installed the app was because it offers me a single manager to access not only local files but also my server without having to start the difficult to use synology file manager. It also does auto rotate, something I,ve found not all file manager apps do. Kudos for including both features.

Usually a GREAT app - have downloaded on multiple devices and love the features. I do agree w/ 1 of the other reviews here; since Feb 2020 or so, constant glitches & force-closing occur. Uninstalled/reinstalled, cleared as much of my phone cache as I could find, tried various modules in the app. Nothing. Have to uninstall for now but will be back, hope this helps dev

Useful but (fromfeb 2020) unstable and may pose risks on newer/ updated device Back then, I used the program because it has features like SMB and other NAS support. Unfortunately, the app isn't able to keep up with time. New android updates have made the program a risk/threat. It has hang/ crashed during data transfer. Most importantly, it has deleted files from my SD card on multiple occasions. If necessary, copy the files to disposable SD using the built in file manager before using this

Great file-manager app with very useful feature, "duplicate files" in storage analyzer. Have picture viewer built-in, only video player not included. But when i view some image, i see hard to slide it to see next/previous image with fast slide, must use from left to right to view another images, maybe because i'm use different phone. The overall of app is great

I've been using this for years, but now, after the update, annoying and irritating "force close" happens whenever I move or copy files, and even renaming files. Please fix asap. I've been encountering this bug/error for months.

title: Wrike - Project Management
description:
GET WORK DONE FASTER WITH WRIKE PROJECT MANAGEMENT

Wrike (https://www.wrike.com) is a powerful cloud software tool for project management, planning, and team collaboration. Trust an app used by over 15,000 organizations —  including small, mid-size and enterprise Fortune 500 companies. Wrike was included as one of the fastest growing companies in North America on Deloitte's Technology Fast 500™ List for the third consecutive year.

KEY PROJECT MANAGEMENT & COLLABORATION FEATURES:

• Access your Wrike Account: Free, Professional, Business, Enterprise or Wrike for Marketers plans, or create a new account from your phone. 
• Quickly access folders and projects
• Assign and schedule tasks
• Review Inbox, notifications, @ mentions, and Activity Stream when you’re on the go
• Attach existing images and files to tasks right from your phone
• View & adjust projects in List, Board, Gantt Chart^ or Workload^ views
• Track time spent on tasks our quick automated timer^
• Receive or submit requests through customized forms*
• View custom Reports as tables or graphical charts, and share them with teams, executives or clients*
• Access your personal and shared Dashboards^

With comprehensive project management tools, Wrike is perfect for all your project scheduling needs.

comments: 1 star because it even challenges common logic. A sub-task may finish AFTER the main task!!!! This causes tremendous overhead to create dependency of the main task to its sub-tasks. This is the only way Wrike project schedules maintain consistency on execution times.
Good app and integration with outlook. Would consider a paid version for personal use if could buy a licence for individuals, not just for 5 or more

Painfully slow app with some cool features, not super user friendly but I'm assuming anyone under 40 can figure it out. Also I dont see many apps with gantt charts that allow for hourly editing which could be something to consider. I can't see ever using this in a professional setting but it has been good so far for personal use.

Great app. Works just as well as the desktop version. Intuitive interface. Updates almost instantly when comments or files are uploaded by other collaborators to projects and tasks. I highly recommend it for anyone that already uses wrike online or on desktop.
Best for tracking projects and much useful for any design companies

title: Bills Reminder, Budget & Expense Manager App
description:
Simple & Secure Money Manager App

Never miss bills and due dates with Free TimelyBills App, which helps you pay your bills on time, and avoid paying extra money towards late payment fee, Use TimelyBills App to track your income & expenses, and save more.  

TimelyBills App is completely secure with bank-grade two level data security.


FIVE AMAZING FEATURES:

➢  Manage your Bills and never pay late fee again.
➢  Manage your Income & Expenses and save more.
➢  Manage your Budget and receive alerts for over spending.
➢  Useful reports to give you actual view of your money & spending  📊📈.
➢  Generate Excel or PDF based statement/reports.
➢  Sync data across all your devices Android, iPhone and Computer.


MORE FEATURES
➢ Automatic reminders for Upcoming and Overdue bills.
➢ Bills calendar widget for home screen to show bills for current week.
➢ Monthly view of your spending trends.
➢ Category wise spending trends to see how you spend over a period.
➢ Consolidated expense report for month and yearly basis.
➢ Attach bill receipts with expenses for future reference.
➢ Two step data security using a password and security PIN.
➢ Support for worldwide currencies.


For more details visit us
 https://timelybills.app/ 


App requires following permissions for best user experience:

SHOW NOTIFICATIONS
→ Required to show bill reminders and over spending alerts.
WRITE/READ STORAGE (USB or EXTERNAL)
→ Required for local backup/restore of app data.
INTERNET ACCESS
→ Required for online bill payment feature.
START AT BOOT
→ Required to configure and display app notifications.

comments: This app is very simple and very well put together. However, I am giving one star due to the fact that when observing your annual savings chart, the app only factors in expenses (non-recurring) and not bills (recurring). This is a big problem due to the fact that a vast portion of everyones monthly expenses stems from bills. If this feature could be implemented, I would gladly return and give this 5 stars.

I typically don't review apps however I found this one especially helpful. It has a good ui/ux and most of the functionality that is needed to quickly track and log expenses. I gave it 4 stars not bc a lack of quality but because I think that it could use abit of tweaking on the yearly/monthly savings overview. It would be nice if it showed a monthly breakdown of expected savings based on the bills/expenses that are recurring minus the recurring income. Other then that, timelybills is fantastic.

I am about 80-90% satisfied with this app. It is the only one I was able to find that does NOT connect to any of my bank or credit card accounts. I am just NOT ready for any apps to have direct contact to any of my personal business as there are a lot of them that does. I rather enter any information manually. The only other thing I would like to see with this app is the ability to see my running balance as to how much I have left to spend on the home screen. This is very important to me!

Very nice and neat app, love it! Paid for the ads-free version on third day of use , totally worth it. Potential enhancements: finger print or facial login, allow to backup at google cloud, after upgrade to ads free version show more features on dashboard, like budget and settings, since there is more screen real estate, also after ads free upgrade push some useful articles on dashboard, such as good money habit.. Bug: top right 3 dots -> settings -> any option -> go back, it goes to main dash

I really like that I don't have to connect this to my bank account. I can get reminders of bills and a view of, say, bills due or anticipated this week. I only would like to be able to see bills and income on the same screen so I know if a certain bill is covered by an upcoming check or not.

title: Wi-Fi Management~Manage Multiple Router Setup Page
description:
This Wi-Fi Management it's Manage Multiple Wi-Fi Router Setup Page & Manage Local Wi-Fi Business app in 2019.

Feature:
# Easily Setup any Wi-Fi Router.
# Manage Multiple Wi-Fi at One’s.
# Simply Manage Your Local Wi-Fi Business.
# Export/Import User Database in SD Card.
# Copy/Move Users Wi-Fi Router to Router.

Wi-Fi Management হচ্ছে একটি ম্যানেজমেন্ট সিস্টেম অ্যাপ।
এই অ্যাপ এ আপনি যা যা পাবেনঃ

১) একাধিক ওয়াইফাই রাউটার এই অ্যাপ দিয়ে কনফিগার করতে পারবেন।
২) আপনার ওয়াইফাই রাউটার  কনফিগারেশন পেইজের লিংক মনে না থাকলেও সমস্যা নেই, এটি অটো করে দিবে।
 
আপনি যদি একাধিক ওয়াইফাই দিয়ে ব্যবসা করতে চান? User Regster করার কোন বিকল্প নেই। আর এই অ্যাপ আপানকে সেই সুবিধা দিচ্ছে। 

৩) আপানর কোন রাউডারে কত জন ইউজার আছে এবং কত জন টাকা দিয়েছে বা কত জন টাকা দেয়নি সেই ইনফো গুলো পাওয়া যাবে।
৪) কোন ইউজার কত দিন আপনার ওয়াইফাই ব্যবহার করেছে সেটাও যান্তে পারবে।

আশাকরি এই অ্যাপ টি ডাউনলোড করে ৫ স্টার রেটিং দিয়ে আমাদের সাথে থাবেন। ধন্যবাদ। 
এই অ্যাপ টির কাজ এখনো পুরপুরি শেষ হয়নি। নতুন কোন  যুক্ত করতে বা আপনার যেকোন মতামত দিয়ে আমাদের কে পাঠাতে পারেন এই মেইলেঃ  developer.mru.studio.2019@gail.com

title: Money Manager: Expense Tracker, Free Budgeting App
description:
Money Manager helps you track your financial activity efficiently. Its simple design makes it lightweight, straightforward and very easy to use.  It’s done in one click, because you don’t need to fill anything except the amount. You need just a few SECONDS daily to save the amount and each spending purpose. No matter where you are just a couple of taps will save your expense. 

Key features:

Easy to Use, Clean and Intuitive Expense & Income Tracker
• Intuitive and easy to use user interface. No redundancy Add new records extremely fast. 

Tracking Expenses and Incomes
• Easily record the transaction to track where your money comes and goes.

The Whole Picture in One Place
• Clear view on your financial life. Better understand where your money comes and goes with visualized reports about income, expense by time and category. 


Spending / Income Pie Chart
• See your spending distribution on the nice and informative chart or get, view your transactions grouped by categories.

Budget and Bill Organizing
• Organizing bills by week, month and year as well as by categories.Record all items in a single transaction with different category and amount.

Reminder
• Set reminders to remain you to record transactions every day.

No Advertising, Without limitation Features, Free
• Money Manager can be used for Free, without ads and no features restriction.

Languages

• English
• Chinese (Traditional)
• Japanese
• Korean
• Russian
• Spanish
• Portuguese
• Hindi
• Indonesian
• German
• French

Money management is always complicated and most of the time you get to wonder where did all your money go, luckily, our simple personal finance app can helps you easily manage your money and keep track of your expense. You can stay on top of your money anytime, anywhere.

recentChanges:

comments: Does what it says on the tin, but only 4 stars cause of a slightly annoying bug. There's a constant banner-type message on the main page which says I need to log in to avoid losing all my data. But it doesn't let me log in. Every time I've tried the screen does a weird thing and I get an error. I've tried logging in with all the options given and it does the same thing. If this can be fixed I'll upgrade to 5 stars. Till then I shall continue to live in fear of losing my data

Disappointed with the feature of not being able to restore your data from an older device. I was consistently maintaining a tab of all my expenses on a daily basis for the last 7 months. However, my phone was stolen a couple of days back. Now, after installing the app on my new phone, I'm not able to login and view all my expenses. The whole purpose of using this app is defeated if I cannot login to another device and view my expenses. Very disappointed.

Great, easy to use app to just track where your money goes. What does annoy me: you cannot set date range. We don't all get paid on the first or last of the month. If my month runs 15th - 14th, I am unable to properly track monthly expenses. Wish this would be fixed. Then 5 stars from me!

Such a great UI. The best interface and convenient to use. Had fallen in love with the whole operation. But despite may negative reviews the developers are ignorant of the login issue. Please atleast respond so we know you're working on a fix. Don't ruin your whole product just because of such a simple issue. Please fix it. I myself am a developer and know how important a product is to a developer. Please care about it. And care about the what your consumers think.

Love this app. I am only just getting to really use it now I have moved out. It has an easy pie chart to work out where all your money is going. It will also have the amount you spent and a percentage. I learnt 46% is a bit high for my household bills. Bit have paid a one off insurance for a car. So this will vary monthly. I'm not the best with money and find It hard to save. It would be a good idea to be able to add 2 savers accounts. As I don't mix my main account with the savings ones.

title: App Usage - Manage/Track Usage
description:
App Usage is the easiest to use but powerful app/device usage management app.

It provides the following key features:
★ App usage history: gather the usage time about apps that you used
★ Check phone history: gather counts of you checked the phone
★ Activity history: gather the time that you open apps
★ Notification history: show the time that apps posted notifications
★ Battery history: display the battery usage graph
★ Over-use reminder: remind when you spend on phone or apps for a long time
★ Most used apps - show most used apps on widgets or a notification
★ Track all installs: keep track of all installs and uninstalled apps
★ App install reminder: notify when apps installed and the summary of daily installed apps
★ Manage apps: 1-tap to uninstall apps, sort apps by various options

Due to the restriction of Android, the app usage can only be tracked when you are using the app and screen is on.

► APP USAGE HISTORY
Do you know how much time you spend on an app? Do you know the total use time of a day or average use time of an app?

It lists the usage time of apps by you preferred sorting order. This usage information is helpful for you to check which apps should be uninstalled as they are not used. It can also be used for spying whether an app has been used by someone else.
 
► CHECK PHONE HISTORY
Do you know how many times a day that you check your phone?

It shows the daily count that you checked your phone in either a bar chart or calendar view.

► ACTIVITY HISTORY
Do you know the time that you open Messaging or E-Mail app in a day?

It shows the time that you open an app in either a timeline or calendar view.

► NOTIFICATION HISTORY
It shows you the number of notifications you received for each day and the time that an app posted the notification.

► OVER-USE REMINDER
It reminds you of when you spend on phone or apps for a long time.

► MOST USED APPS
It shows a list of your most used apps on widgets or system notification. It's a convenient way to quick start the apps you use most frequently. The more you use it, the better it gets.

► TRACK ALL INSTALLS
It tracks and lists the history of all installed and uninstalled apps by you preferred sorting order. It's convenient for you to track how many apps updated in a day, and how frequent updates of an app.

► APP INSTALL REMINDER
It reminds you when an app installed and the summary of daily apps installation.

► MANAGE APPS
Do you know which apps that are not used for a long time? You can get more available space by uninstalling apps, but which one is bloatware?

It lists apps by app name, usage time, access count, update time or size, and allows you to uninstall apps easily and quickly.

FEATURES
★ Phone/App usage, activity, check phone, notification and battery history
★ Daily usage, over-use reminder
★ Most used apps
★ Export/backup/restore usage data
★ App installation history
★ App install reminder
★ Keep track of uninstalled apps so you can install them later
★ Root uninstaller, 1-tap to uninstall apps, rooted device required
★ Add personal notes for each app
★ Sort apps by name, usage time, access count, update time or size
★ Batch clear apps cache or data
★ Easy search apps by name
★ Support Android 2~10

PRIVACY
Your privacy is very important to us, we understand this problem and won't collect/sell your usage data

We have been selected as a Google I/O 2011 Developer Sandbox partner, for its innovative design and advanced technology.

If you'd like to help the translation, please send me an email.

comments: Couldn't review this app higher! The *only* app usage application that is FREE!!! I love how it tells me as a notification how much times I have opened my phone/minutes on my phone but it doesn't show up as a notification! Stop looking now for another app for you phone! This is the one!😂

Have been using the pro version for a couple of weeks now. Very nice UI overall, I especially like the pie-chart visualization of per-category usage. Notification-behavior is perfectly customizable. While I am using the app mainly for (eye-opening!) usage tracking, I also appreciate the option to analyze battery usage. Finally, the developer is extremely responsive to requests and feedback. Highly recommended!

I double checked but i don't see any such option which i mentioned. I don't see 👀 a page where they show me my apps usage from [STARTING_TIME] this - to [ENDING_TIME] this. Where I'm asked to set both times and it show me the usage in between them. It's just a suggestion, nothing huge for which i will rate you lower than 5✨
It's not working. Everytime I want to check it, it's deactivated. Even being already classified as free to consume battery, so it's not collecting data.
I used this app to get rid of a virus and it seems like it worked. I had this virus where it would show me random ads, and I don't see these ads anymore.

title: Inventory Management App – Zoho Inventory
description:
Get a better grip on your inventory with powerful features like item management,  order management, multiple warehouse management, and order fulfillment. It also comes loaded with inventory control software features like inventory tracking, inter-warehouse transfer, and barcode scanning. 

From configuring products to creating orders, to delivering them,  to receiving invoice payments, Zoho Inventory simplifies your everyday inventory requirements. With all of your stock related data available in our inventory management app, you can go anywhere you want to and stay on top of your stock management. 
Switch to a smarter way of managing stock. Switch to mobile inventory management.

Key Features 

Contact management

Keep in touch with your business contacts. Have access to your customer and vendor details at any time.

Items

Add new goods and services to your inventory on the fly and get quick looks into the stock level in individual warehouses. Zoho Inventory also helps you customise your inventory to suit your business model with item grouping and composite items and lets you view item adjustments made, right from your mobile app.

Sales Orders - Online and offline order tracking

Never miss out on a sales opportunity. The Zoho Inventory app automatically fetches sales orders from your e-commerce store. It also allows you to create sales orders for offline orders received over the counter which you can download and email to your customers on the go.

Tax compliance

Zoho Inventory lets you stay compliant with your countries tax guidelines. You can associate applicable taxes to your goods and services at the time of creation and Zoho Inventory automatically fetches it for you when you are recording a transaction.

Multiple warehouse management

Get a clear view of real-time stock availability in each warehouse while creating orders. With this information, you can choose the warehouse with sufficient stock to fulfill each order on time.

Order fulfillment

Fulfill orders even while you're away. Create packages and shipments, and view their tracking status in real time. 

Invoices & payments

You can view the invoices you've sent, track payments due from your customers, and accept payments online.

Multicurrency transactions

Take your business global with Zoho Inventory. The multicurrency support lets you capture cross border transactions with ease.

Transfer orders

Simplify inventory transfer recording. Keep track of stock movement between warehouses with resourceful transfer orders.

Quick sales insights

Get a bird's eye view of your sales activities from our smart dashboard. 

More on Zoho Inventory

Web url: https://www.zoho.com/inventory/

Demo link: https://youtu.be/yepWzFP_2D8

Help doc link: https://www.zoho.com/inventory/help/getting-started/welcome-aboard.html


Our mobile app is a supplement to our web-based Zoho Inventory application. After your 14-day trial ends, you can continue using Zoho Inventory by subscribing to a plan that fits your business needs.

comments: The program functions like a dream.. but it's a bit cost prohibitive But functionally, I couldn't ask for more. One critique: If I create a payment method of escrow, it changes to paid as a status. Technically, escrow needs to close or be disputed...so ideally there would be a status of IN escrow, then paid/closed. I would suggest adding escrow as a preloaded payment form and adding the other two invoice status....that's the only work around I found that I needed. Not sure if I can afford it

This program can not properly manage a grouped or composite item. When you contact support they will be unable to help you beyond the help documentation you have already read. They will waste days of your time waiting for call backs and returned e-mail.

I have lots of issues with unflexible working programs of zoho. Primarily i want automated integration with my platforms for sales order. Secondary when i creat invoice from sales order i dont want all the items in the invoice i just want item group head name as item and rest of there varient in description Adding to much item variant in Item list seems very unprofessional on pages and last thing is whenever i created sales package i have to remove all the item again to select one item Change it
Absolutely love it. I am an independent consultant and it has been everything to me!
Amazing and easy to use app. Highly recommended.

title: Manager Tools
description:
Get instant access to the FREE step-by-step advice that’s been *proven* to transform listeners into highly respected managers, admired leaders and star-performing business professionals. The Manager Tools app is your personal gateway to THE WORLD’S MOST AWARDED business podcast. Install today!

Through the Manager Tools app, you’ll immediately be connected to an abundance of free, high-quality business audio content that’s downloaded over 150,000 times per week. Hundreds of actionable Manager Tools and Career Tools podcast episodes are now fully available to you on your Android device – whether you’re connected to the mobile web, Wi-Fi, or even while offline!

So if you’ve ever felt anxiety in the pit of your stomach about transitioning into an entry, mid or high-level management position…

If you hope to become a better manager or more effective leader who your colleagues, clients and family will appreciate…

Or, if you’d simply like to solve just a few specific problems that you’re facing with genuine, real-world strategies (no management theory needed) – the Manager Tools app contains the detailed business solutions you’re searching for! Our app’s seamless search functions will even help you in finding the exact podcast episodes you need to hear.
From handling complicated office politics and emotions, to dealing with meetings, mistakes, morning greetings and so much more… the Manager Tools app provides the technical and interpersonal guidance plus “tough love” that’s necessary in order to flourish as a business management professional in today’s world.

APP FEATURES:

COMPREHENSIVE PODCAST ACCESS
Select from hundreds of hours’ worth of award-winning Manager Tools and Career Tools podcast episodes to listen to. Brand new content is continuously being added, and you’ll always be able to browse through our archives of timeless material.

EASY PLAYABILITY, ZERO STRESS
The Manager Tools app is designed to streamline the content you want to hear with just a few taps of your thumb. You won’t need any podcatchers or unnecessary add-ons to access your precious audio here. Simply tap the Play button to instantly stream the ‘casts you want to hear (requires a mobile internet connection). 

CONVENIENT PODCAST BOOKMARKING AND OFFLINE PLAYBACK
When you know you’ll be somewhere without internet access, or even if you simply want to save your smartphone’s data – you can now Bookmark any of our episodes for convenient offline playback at a later time. Just tap the Bookmark icon located on an episode’s page, and visit your Bookmarked screen to manage downloaded audio.

SMOOTH SEARCH OPTIONS
Tap the Map of the Universe menu option to easily browse through our 800+ podcast episodes (and counting) organized by topic. You can also use the Podcast Search functionality to target specific keywords or find the niche subjects you’re looking for.

IN-PERSON TRAINING, ACCESS TO OUR FORUMS AND MORE
Our Training portal provides you with a live look at all of Manager Tools’ upcoming Effective Manager, Effective Communications and Effective Interviewer Conferences. Dates are scheduled well in advance, and take place throughout the U.S. and beyond. You can also interact with some of the world’s greatest managers and business professionals at any time by tapping on the Forums menu option!

Overall, the Manager Tools app provides novice business managers, experienced professionals and casual corporate competitors with an actionable way to excel in day-to-day business and personal life.

We block out the management theory, provide the honest truth about what actually works, and continue to deliver pure value to our listeners in a fun and convenient audio show format. Install the Manager Tools app right away to take advantage of the abundance of FREE actionable information that awaits. 

Your employees, business associates and family will thank you!

comments: The content is great. The app is not. It appears the app is not set up for background / screen off use as the background process killer reaps the app and stops playback. This is likely what people are running into with being logged out as well. Make it run like a media app and this will likely get bumped to 5 stars.

great content, would love to be able to listen at a taster speed. even if it's only a gesture as a paid member (which I am) would love it so I can use this as the standalone app to consume this content.

The review is for the technical quality of the app itself and *not* the content which is excellent . The app stops working when backgrounded or plugged into headphones. A bit frustrating as the iphone version is much better.
great app that does what I need and even more importantly doesn't have bloat and unnecessary features.
Needs; -keep app alive in background -play status notification -lock screen play status display

title: Management
description: Management (or managing) is the administration of an organization, whether it is a business, a not-for-profit organization, or government body. Management includes the activities of setting the strategy of an organization and coordinating the efforts of its employees (or of volunteers) to accomplish its objectives through the application of available resources, such as financial, natural, technological, and human resources. The term "management" may also refer to those people who manage an organization.

title: Contact Manager: Manage contacts, deals & tasks
description:
When you’re a small business and don’t need all the functionalities of a full-blown CRM, Zoho ContactManager is the ideal tool to grow your business. You can not only organise all your contacts, but also collaborate with your team and access all your deals and tasks right from phone.
 
✩ Everything you need to know about your business contacts in one place. 
Feeds in Zoho ContactManager keeps you and your team updated at all times about contacts, companies, deals, and tasks. Get better context and make smarter decisions. 
 
✩ Sync phone contacts
Easily add contacts from your phone to the Zoho ContactManager app. 
 
✩ Efficiently manage tasks and deals
With Zoho ContactManager, you can track to-dos, know the status of your tasks and see them to completion. Closely monitor and stay on top of your deals. You can also add notes about deals and tasks for easy reference. 
 
✩ Being organized is easy
Use Tags to easily categorize and label contacts, deals, and other records. 
 
✩ Find exactly what you're looking for
The Zoho ContactManager app comes with advanced multi-conditional search which helps you instantly find exactly what you're looking for. For example, find contacts in your city who have given you a certain amount of business without having to go through heaps of data. 
 
✩ Driving directions for nearby contacts
Meet contacts in person. Get driving directions for nearby contacts directly in the Zoho ContactManager app.

title: APUS Message Center—Intelligent management
description:
APUS Message Center is one of the best free unified messenger app for android. It helps unify and manage all messages from SMS, WhatsApp, Gmail and 3rd party apps. It includes message management, notification mamagement, contact manager, dialer and call log. It will completely bring you a fuss-free experience. 

You can not only manage all kinds of messages (SMS, WhatsApp, Gmail, Yahoo mail, and 3rd party apps), but also find your contacts easily and make a phone call or view your call log in the new APUS Message Center. You only need this one application to grasp all the necessary functions. 

If you are always jumping between SMS, WhatsAppp, Facebook Messenger, etc. Please try APUS Message Center right now! APUS Message Center brings you a more intelligent, easier and smarter experience. 

Key Features：


▷Message Management (Support Dual SIM) 

APUS Message Center provides not only free text service such as SMS, WhatsApp, Facebook and instant messages but also email apps such as Gmail. APUS Message Center fully supports dual SIM devices for SMS, so you won’t miss any important messages. And it is also easy to search for contacts and message texts from dual SIM card. 

▷Contact Manager

In APUS Message Center, you can find one contact’s multiple social information and connect with them by dragging to the app you want. Eg. SMS, Dialer, Line, WeChat, WhatsApp, Telegram, Viber, etc. 
▷Notification Management 

APUS Message Center also provides notification manager.It will clean your unimprortant notifications from your notification bar and help you get rid of messy notifications. 

▷Phone Calling

After you check a missed call or chatting with someone, you can directly make a phone call and view your call log in APUS Message Center. 

▷Group Messaging

Tired for your orderless notification bar? Try APUS Message Center now, you can check any notification (Gmail, WeChat, WhatsApp, Skype, Facebook messenger, instant messaging, etc ) you want by using APUS Message Center. It will always organize your important messages so that you can read more simply and conveniently find all notifications at one stop any time. 

▷Quick Reply

When there is a new message from SMS or WhatsApp, a message bubble will pop up to remind you to view the notification. Then you can read and reply messages of SMS and WhatsApp from pop-up notification bubble, without exiting the current app, and quick reply the message directly. 

▷Regular Reminder for Messages 

Notification bar will push so many notifications everyday, what if you miss some important messages? Don’t worry, APUS Message Center always reminds you about the messages from these app: Messages, Call, WeChat, Gmail,  WhatsApp, Facebook messenger, Twitter, Snapchat, Skype,  Tinder and so on. 

You’ll never miss important calls or unread messages (SMS, Gmail, Yahoo mail, social media apps notification)! 

▷Easy Search

Within just one second, you can find notifications, Messages, SMS, Contacts, Calls, email (such as Yahoo mail and Gmail) without fuss by entering keywords. All messages and contacts are collected in one app. 

APUS Message Center is an intelligent, simple, easy and fast messenger and message management tool for android, comes with collecting all messages, such as SMS and 3rd party apps messages. You can enjoy contact manager, phone calling, regular notifications, dual sim support, quick reply, group messages. 

The conversation apps currently supported by APUS Message Center include but not limited: WhatsApp, Hike, Facebook, Facebook Messenger, Gmail, Yahoo Mail, Instagram, Twitter, Snapchat, Wechat, QQ, Skype, LinkedIn, Imo, Kakao, VK, Tinder, Yandex mail, Hangouts and more. 

Contact us：
- Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/APUSGROUP
- Twitter: https://twitter.com/apusgroup
- Mail: apusmsgcenter@gmail.com
- Official website: http://www.apusapps.com

comments: I am sad to say that this app has some nice qualities, but I am very disappointed right now. I wanted to like this app, but I was robbed of a win on their lucky spin wheel! The wheel landed on a $50 Amazon gift card and then, as if to say "Oops just kidding" it makes a rapid jump to the next prize of 15 coins! What the hell!! Even the "shout outs" mentioned my name and the $50 I was suppose to have won, but was just swiped away from right under me!! Also they practically force a 5 star rating!!

Doesn't seem to support sharing MMS or locations, separates combined contacts so be prepared for lots of duplicates. I Don't want an app that doesn't support the best features that come with our stock messaging apps but it adds several unnecessary features like optimizer and booster, which most phones already come with. The app keeps closing as I'm typing this. 3rd time having to reopen. Definitely not recommended. Uninstalling!
I miss the old version this new app is sinking i cant see what i am typing unless i use quick or pop reply

ASAP kept stopping over and over a couldn't even type messages without its stating that there is no problem with this app I really like this at first what is the problem with this app why did it do that

So it felt a little misleading. I was hoping that this app would have all of my accounts in one place. Allowing me to remove all other apps. This app just provides you with notifications. It's like a watcher app. I don't need that I wanted one app that allowed me to login to everything and handle direct messaging with it.

title: Redbooth - Task & Project Management App
description:
WHAT IS REDBOOTH
Redbooth is an easy to use project management software available for teams to stay organized and get work done.  Redbooth allows teams to manage an unlimited number of projects in collaborative workspaces that combine tasks, files and feedback into a centralized, searchable, and in-sync experience; it is the perfect workflow management system!  Available on Android, iOS, web, and desktop, Redbooth teams are more productive because they can easily work together on their favorite device. 
 
START FAST
- Create an account directly through the Android app
- Easily set up dedicated workspaces for each project or task you want to manage
- Super intuitive interface for creating and assigning new tasks
- Just the right level of functionality for busy teams
 
UPDATE ANYWHERE
- View and organize your work from anywhere 
- Create tasks, conversations or update projects anytime
- Add due dates, assignees or comments to any task
- Update tasks as work is completed or notify others about changes
- Everything is automatically saved and synced
 
TRACK EVERYTHING
- See your favorite workspaces and task management lists
- Assess the progress of shared projects and spot dependencies early
- Visualize progress as you complete projects
 
STAY CONNECTED
- Get notified of important updates
- Speed up feedback with integrated messaging tools
- Notification settings are fully customizable
- Use Redbooth conversations to chat within the app
 
PRICING
-Free: 2 users and 2 workspaces for teams getting started with project management
-Professional: From $9/mo: subtasks, reporting, and guest users for growing teams
-Business: From $15/mo: assignable subtasks and priority support for large teams
 
COMPARE
Other tools can’t come close to the ease of use of Redbooth, which is built specifically for busy teams who don’t have a lot of time to spare.
descriptionHTML:
WHAT IS REDBOOTH
Redbooth is an easy to use project management software available for teams to stay organized and get work done. Redbooth allows teams to manage an unlimited number of projects in collaborative workspaces that combine tasks, files and feedback into a centralized, searchable, and in-sync experience; it is the perfect workflow management system! Available on Android, iOS, web, and desktop, Redbooth teams are more productive because they can easily work together on their favorite device.

START FAST
- Create an account directly through the Android app
- Easily set up dedicated workspaces for each project or task you want to manage
- Super intuitive interface for creating and assigning new tasks
- Just the right level of functionality for busy teams

UPDATE ANYWHERE
- View and organize your work from anywhere
- Create tasks, conversations or update projects anytime
- Add due dates, assignees or comments to any task
- Update tasks as work is completed or notify others about changes
- Everything is automatically saved and synced

TRACK EVERYTHING
- See your favorite workspaces and task management lists
- Assess the progress of shared projects and spot dependencies early
- Visualize progress as you complete projects

STAY CONNECTED
- Get notified of important updates
- Speed up feedback with integrated messaging tools
- Notification settings are fully customizable
- Use Redbooth conversations to chat within the app

PRICING
-Free: 2 users and 2 workspaces for teams getting started with project management
-Professional: From $9/mo: subtasks, reporting, and guest users for growing teams
-Business: From $15/mo: assignable subtasks and priority support for large teams

COMPARE
Other tools can’t come close to the ease of use of Redbooth, which is built specifically for busy teams who don’t have a lot of time to spare.
summary: The best free project and task management app for team collaboration.
recentChanges: - Disabled request for review
comments: Since the last two updates I'm unable to assign a due date to new or existing tasks. When I try to set the date and tap "OK" nothing changes and the due date remains unset. It works fine on the desktop app so it is very frustrating when I am away from my office using my tablet and trying to add tasks to my schedule but can't set a due date. I am using a Samsung Galaxy Note 10 running Android 4.4.2 with the latest version of the app installed. I have already tried uninstalling and reinstalling the app but no change. Can you please help ☺
Cant use the time tracking feature in the app. This is one of the main things I use redbooth for.

Just signed up for a trial online. Service looked useful so I installed the app, only to have it get stuck on the "Almost there" screen. Forced closed app. No change. No point in re-installing as this was a new install. Just cancelling my trial. The 3 stars is because the tool seems useful on the web, but I didn't get a good feeling when the app didn't load. Not worth my time to troubleshoot at this point.

Desktop app is good. Over the past month or so the Android app has really fallen apart. Nothing works anymore and customer service is extremely slow with a response. Not sure how they let this app decline so quickly. Unless they fix this app it is not good enough for any kind of project management much less running any kind of business application. Extremely disappointing given how good the desktop app is. But not being able to use the mobile version is a deal breaker for me.

Though the web portal works mostly fine, but the app version has plenty of issues and features missing. Please add the "date & time spent" edit feature to edit the pre-added date and time of a task's comment. Also if the search feature is added inside the workspace task view it would be great.

title: Free POS System To Manage Stock Control & Billing
description:
Zobaze POS is Free Android Point of Sale app ( Tools ) for any retail stores, any small shops, Fast Food, Food Shop, Restaurant, Food Truck, beauty salons & spa, car wash, small or individual business,  any service business, home business and more.

Why use Zobaze POS?

Use Zobaze POS (point of sale app) instead of a cash register to track sale, inventory in real-time, manage inventory items ( products and services ), manage customers data, view sales reports, send a digital invoice via SMS, WhatsApp and more.

Convert your smartphone or tablet to a complete point of sale software which is very easy to use and handy.

Key Features :
➡ Sale & Billing 
➡ Inventory Management ( Products & Services )
➡ Customer Management
➡ Point of Sale Board
➡ Reports
➡ Works Offline
➡ Manage Multiple Business

Use Zobaze POS to :
✔ Sell from your smartphone or tablet 
✔ Manage Products
✔ Manage Services
✔ Send Digital Receipts/Invoices
✔ Track Sales Activity 
✔ Manage Staff
✔ Manage Customers and their order history 
✔ Bill Offline
✔ Barcode Scanner

MOBILE POINT OF SALE
Replace Cash Register with our POS app
Track Each and Every Sale even offline
Apply Discounts, Tax, Other Chargers
Send Digital Invoice/Receipts to your customer via SMS / WhatsApp / Email
Track Inventory in real time.
easy to add a barcode to inventory items. 

INVENTORY MANAGEMENT
Easily Organize items/stock with custom price and multiple units support.
Add Categories to organize easily.
Easy to add barcode and SKU's
Tag colors, and shapes to items for easy organizing.
Instant Add Item helps to quickly bill an item which is not in inventory.

Give permission like Items Management, Admin and Customer Management

Help Support

Zobaze POS is a cloud-based POS cum Billing cum Inventory Management cum CRM System application.

comments: 1. GST should be applicable on the amount after deducting discounts form it. 2. Way to manage credit and the amount that I received as partial payment is very bad. And more over when I created a bill over credit as payment method then the app started crashing and it wasn't saved I tried it almost 10 times everyone it did the same. 3. Edit/Add Transaction date if I am adding a previous transaction. 4. Saving a picture of physical card of customer when adding a new customer. 5. Option to call &...

Great App! I like it. It has all what I need in a Sales POS App. But this last update brought something am not comfortable with. Please go back to the former small window that pops up when you click on an item that contains one product, big for many products. So one can easily tap on an empty area of the screen to dismiss without going down for the back button. Now it fills the screen always irrespective of the no of items leaving a large and useless white portion and blocking the whole screen.

The app working great and it is also Free! The only issue i found is sometimes it is connection to Bluetooth Printer lost, have tried with 3 different phones and 2 different Bluetooth Printer the result are the same. Hope it can be fixed. The other thing is somehow Zobaze cannot open the cash drawer after transaction received. I will give 5 starts when above issue can be resolved. Great job Zobaze team!

App is so good for managing small or home based business. Checked plenty of other apps. Love the simplicity and the feature of staff managenent. This really deserves a 5 star. However, rating 4 as there is no option to export the data in csv or xls, pdf in customer, products and sales forms. Also please add that feature ASAP.

I love this app. It helps greatly with my business. I love that it's free, but wish there was a way to sort, or organize the "catergoties" either alphabetically or manually. When I add a new category, it pops in wherever, and I spend a lot of time searching through my inventory looking for the category I need to complete a sale.

title: File Manager : free and easily
description:
Mi File Manager is a free, secure tool that helps you find file faster, manage files easily, and share them offline with others. It supports tons of cool features: quick search, moving, deleting, opening, and sharing files, as well as renaming, unzipping, and copy-paste. Mi File Manager also recognizes multiple file formats, including music, videos, images, documents, APKs, and zip-files. We update our app regularly to bring you the best experience. With Mi File Manager’s crisp and clear UI, file management becomes easier than ever before! 

Key features
Recent: View the files you worked with recently without looking for them.
Categories: Files are organized into categories by their formats. From there, you can access to frequently used apps quickly.
Storage: View your storage stats and manage all folders on your device.
Cleaner: Free up storage space on your device by deleting cache and junk files.
Mi Drop: Share files with friends who are nearby without connecting to the Internet.
Global search: Enter keywords to find files.
Multiple file formats support: Open videos, music, documents, APKs, and compressed files with one tap.
File compression: Compress and decompress ZIP/RAR archives.
Manage multiple files: Select multiple files for the same operation.
Multiple languages supported: Bahasa Indonesia, Bengali, Chinese, English, Español, Português, ру́сский язы́к, українська мова, Tiếng Việt

comments: Fast, easy file manager from Xiaomi. When I'm not using Termux to manage files I use this application especially if I'm looking for a certain video photo and don't remember what the name was. Offers basics such as file compression/decompression, copy, delete, move, etc. Have sensitive eye's like me? DAMN my big, beautiful blue eyes… Not a problem due to a application wide dark mode which can be found in the left side menu. It makes me want a Xiaomi/Redmi device. This 2016 Pixel is washed up.

An enterprise-level official app shouldn't contain any ads! Or at least allow us to buy a Pro version of the app that's ads-free. It doesn't even have the "Cut" feature (I had to copy, paste, and then remove the old file, instead of cut/paste). Go for Solid Explorer.

It is a great file manager, but I have an issue, Not all my drive folders are showing in the file manager, almost 100 folders are visible, while I have 300 of folders, rest of them are not visible. And wish I could have the feature to directly stream videos from drive. Hope you will look into it and fix this issue, lower the rating for your attention.

This is actually amazing. Organising my files was such a hassle, I love how when I press to go back it takes me back to the previous file location, no matter sd or internal, it makes things easier and I don't have to keep manually going back to the file locations after I move or copy. Smooth and easy interface, user friendly. Good job!

No option to keep multiple files with the same name in the same folder when I move or copy them (normally it should ask if you want to rename the copied files, but not in this app). And also, the confirmation buttons when I copy or moving the files keeps popping out it makes the app looks annoying, you should add buttons like "skip all", "rename all" and "replace all" everytime I copy files with the same name instead of confirm it one by one

Business Founder is a realistic management simulation that will get you under the skin of a CEO. 

Have fun while learning about actual business concepts!

Become a CEO now and discover the day-to-day of an entrepreneur:

✔ Create and Manage your company

comments: Good game! But needs more content. One glitch is when selecting your 3 focus strategies, the name of the strategies are either blank or random characters with only few showing full correct name. It's not a 1 time thing, happens everytime

Decent game. It is way too short and appears to be a marketing game for your stencils website if anything. It would be better if you could do take overs if business, maybe play real world style play too. It just has no structure or rewards for anything
Very cool and fun game. Only problem; once you get to a certain point. The game just ends. There's almost no more improvements you can make.
Always say that there is another strategy upgrade..but there is no uprgade at all and i have to wait for how long?

Game is okay, I get the concept and the features and graphics are great, some bugs tho and also needs a little change because you're trying to build an empire but you have no idea what you're selling so you have no idea how to price or how to strategies properly so it's more like guess work and trying to find hidden trends to build your business.

title: App Manager
description:
Do you hate the multiple steps it takes to just uninstall your apps  ?
Do you sometimes install many apps in order to find one that suits your needs, but then you hate the time it takes to uninstall the rest?
Do you need to reset/uninstall apps frequently ?
Do you have a third party launcher and hate the fact that installing apps puts shortcuts on the old launchers?
Wanna try getting rid of some of the bloatware your device has (*) ?

If so, this is the app for you !

Features
This app has plenty of features, especially for rooted devices:

• Easiest uninstaller - single click on an app to uninstall it
• Batch operations of apps : uninstallation, share, disable/enable, Re-install, manage, open in Play-Store or Amazon-AppStore.
• APK files management
• Removed Apps history viewer
• Customizable Widgets, for uninstalling the recently installed app or clearing its internal/external data
• Normal/ROOT uninstallation of apps . Using ROOT, it's much easier and faster
• Shows all kinds of apps, and not just those that you can launch. For example: widgets, live wallpapers, keyboards, launchers, plugins,...
• Auto-handling of apps that have admin privileges, allowing you to revoke them and uninstall the apps
• Auto add shortcuts to newly installed apps, no matter how you've installed them. Also choose exactly which launcher will have the new shortcuts
• Various operations on selected app:
   • Run
   • Share app as link or APK file
   • Manage
   • Open link on play store.
   • Kill background processes (available only on old Android versions)
   • Stop app (needs ROOT+Honeycomb)
   • Clear internal storage (ROOT) 
   • Create shortcut, including hidden ones
   • Search the Internet for app's name/package
   • Disable/Enable app (ROOT)
   • Re-install
• Sort apps by size, name, package, date installed, date updated, launch time
• OS uninstallation integration
• Useful shortcuts to built in apps
• Filter apps by:
   • System/user apps
   • Enabled/disabled apps
   • Installation path: SD card / internal storage
• Ability to uninstall system apps (Root , might not work on some cases)
• Shows app information: package name, date installed, build number, version name
• Auto-cleaning of external storage files of apps that the OS didn't remove them right for some reason
• Theme chooser, in case you don't like the cards UI

Best of all, it's free ! ! !

Permissions explanations

• INSTALL_SHORTCUT - allows the app to create apps shortcuts, either manually or automatically (upon installation)
• KILL_BACKGROUND_PROCESSES - allows the app to kill selected apps
• READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE - allows the app to check if there is taken space on selected app, in order to allow to reclaim it
• WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE - to clear the external storage of selected app
• ACCESS_SUPERUSER - for rooted devices only, allows many more cool features, for example background uninstallation
• ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE , INTERNET- for ads
• BILLING, GET_ACCOUNTS - for donations
• GET_PACKAGE_SIZE - for getting apps' sizes
• GET_TASKS , PACKAGE_USAGE_STATS - to get recently launched apps

Notes

• Uninstallation of system apps is a risky operation. I do not hold any responsibility in case the functionality of your OS is damaged in any way when using this feature
•Some system apps cannot be removed due to restrictions enforced by the ROM itself, but the app will try handling it the best it can, and sometimes a restart is needed to see the result
• You can remove the ads by donating as much as you wish
• I've worked for a long time on this app, and I have plenty of features I have in mind to add to it
• Please feel free to rate the app and show your opinion (preferably via the forum) on which features you'd like to have for the next versions.

If you liked this app, show you support by rating it, sharing it or donating.

title: Subscription Management App - Zoho
description:
Zoho Subscriptions is smart recurring billing tool for subscription businesses. Businesses that provide services on a recurring basis like educational institutes, magazine/newspaper publishers, Gym centers and Web hosting providers need to manage customer subscriptions, cancellations, refunds and payments on a daily basis. As a small business owner, these tasks eat up a lot of your valuable time, which you can spend on growing your business. Zoho Subscriptions Android app will be a constant companion to you and provide you with important alerts regarding your subscriptions.

Key highlights of Zoho Subscriptions Android app.

With the Zoho Subscriptions Android app, you can :

- Access a comprehensive dashboard that displays key metrics like net revenue, activations, signups, active customers, cancellations, MRR, churn, ARPU, and LTV of a customer.

- Add your customer information and access it from a single place.

- Add and edit the product, plan, addon, and coupon information.

- Create and view subscriptions on the go. Add everything related to subscriptions: overview, plan details, and customer information.

- View all the sent and upcoming invoices and always be in the know of money coming in.

- Record payment for offline subscription invoices.

- View all the credit notes associated to customers.

- Know whether a payment transaction has succeeded or failed for an invoice from the transactions module under settings.

- Get a complete list of all the currencies and their conversion rates to your base currency. You can also add more currencies to it.

- Get instantly notified when a customer subscribes to a plan.

- Fine tune your preferences for your invoices, customers, payments, and credit notes modules from the settings section.

- Configure a passcode to protect your data from prying eyes.

- Know when customers cancel their subscription, so you can follow-up with them immediately.

- Get to know when a new payment method - bank/credit card is added by your customers.

- Know exactly when and why a customer fails to subscribe to your plan and reach out to them on time. 

If you need any assistance using Zoho Subscriptions Android app, please get in touch with us at support+mobile@zohosubscriptions.com

title: Food Street - Restaurant Management & Food Game
description:
Food Street is a restaurant simulation and management game that lets you create, design and decorate your own restaurant! Build, bake and design in a restaurant game that puts you in charge of your very own business. Make it you own bakery, cafe or food truck game!

Start farming your own ingredients, cook food and prepare original recipes in a stunning 3D city filled with delightful characters! This food game lets you create and serve food for all your customers while you run your own kitchen.

Make sure your restaurant is designed to hold tons of hungry customers and feed them too! Master this restaurant management game and have endless cooking fun in one of the most addicting games around!

What will your restaurant story be?

---------------------------

FOOD STREET FEATURES

🏘️ Build Your Restaurants!
~ Build your restaurant and garden from the ground up! 
~ Expand your kitchen with new stations for different foods.
~ Design your restaurants by purchasing items and staff uniforms to give your cafe a personal touch, even for the holidays!
~ Make a number of unique and cool restaurants, whether it is cafe, diner, or bakery themed, by purchasing decoration. You can even make it a food truck game.

🌾 Farm Your Own Ingredients!
~ Farm for ingredients in your own garden and use them in all of your dishes!
~ Start farming and building more farm plots to grow more ingredients!
~ Search for more land to expand your farm and growing restaurant! 
~ Raise your own cute pets to attract customers, build a cafe or diner and adopt dogs, horses, pigs and more

👩‍🍳 Cook Amazing Food!
~ Cooking and baking made easy with simple gameplay and fun characters.
~ Cook food on your own schedule without the stress of time limits and start serving your customers!

😃 Serve Your Customers!
~ In this food game you’re the chef! Start cooking food for your customers and keep them happy.
~ Serving games let you cook for free in this fun restaurant game with stunning 3D graphics!

🌶️ Restaurant Management!
~ Fans of food games and cafe games will love managing their own restaurant!
~ Create multiple restaurant layouts to promote your business in a fast-growing tasty town.
~ Decorate your restaurants using Food Street’s restaurant upgrades!
~ Experience fun and exciting restaurant management games without the pressure of a time limit.

✨ Online Food Management!
~ Manage your restaurants story like no other food games: Collaborate in restaurant Food Clubs to compete in friendly competitions.
~ Play food games and cafe games in online Food Clubs where you and your friends trade recipes and cook together.
~ Participate in restaurant games with your friends!

Food Street is the perfect restaurant management game for any fan of baking, farming or food games. Design your own restaurant city and decorate it according to your style! Don’t wait any longer. Make your own resturant in the finest tasty town! Download Food Street today!

PLEASE NOTE: Food Street is free to download. However, purchases can be made in the game for real money. If you don’t want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device settings and play your food games for free. A network connection is required to play and manage your resturant.

---------------------------
SUPPORT
If you’re having problems with Food Street, we’re very sorry. Our friendly resturant team is ready to help you run your tasty town and enjoy your food games for free! Please visit: http://www.supersolid.co.uk/forum/index.php?forums/feedback.26/
Privacy Policy:
http://supersolid.com/privacy/
Terms of Service:
http://supersolid.com/tos/

comments: Ingenious game with plenty of animation and variety of things to do. Cannot express enough the joy it has given me! There is a lot one can do for free. With this ingenious programming, one must show a little support. I love taking care of little people...with food! The flexibility is endless. It's my world and beauty abound.

This game is awsome,but you have to buy a lot of stuff and if you added a place where you could make your own received that be grate thanks also,don't let people who think there games better put adds on this app.tell them back off this is my game I hate adds and what has lots of adds in it so I don't wanna hate this game to so please limit adds and the rest.we kids out there hate adds so if you want more good review than limit adds and let them make the food all by themselves lots of of love .
I love this game. My only issue is how hard it is to get certain materials for expansions and such. I've been playing for a few years now, and I can't even expand because I have no resources
Collecting gems to upgrade equipment is near impossible without paying to upgrade. Also, cook times and plant harvesting times are too long. Why can't we use cash earned in the game to buy gems?

Im rating this beacuse this is the fourth time i have lost my game for bloody no reason what is this happening i always again has to start from the starting again and again this is happening .... ? When this problem is gona be fixed

▸ What Customers Have To Say…

recentChanges:
- Import products that have reached the minimum stock into an purchase-order.
- User experience optimized.
- Bug fixes.
comments: Best stock keeping app for Android. A little daunting at first, with all the options on offer but as well as being intuitive, the developer has created an excellent YouTube channel to guide you through everything this app can do. Cloud backup is a good inclusion too.
Fantastic but it would be nice if you could print out a barcode as well.

Amazingly reliable and fast! We're using it for our company that has more than 150k products, yet, it's working very very well and never failed after month of use. The only problem is that there is no option to export the CSV to Google Sheets or connect to a database. Thumbs up to the developer! Bravo!

I was looking for a app that would let me keep track of all my spare parts that I have to keep on hand for my small engine repairs. This is the one that I picked out of several apps that I tried. I did have one question and the developer responded very quickly. This one is very much a keeper.

It is a great app for managing stock... But if i could give any suggestion for improvement, i would love to improve on the sum value of stock each storage area... So if user has some storage area, they would know how many stock they have on each storage area.. Thanks

title: QuickBooks Online Accounting, Invoicing & Expenses
description:
Track miles, manage invoices, maintain your financial reports and cash flow, and see your profit and loss. Run your small business on the go with the QuickBooks Online Accounting app, trusted by over 4.3 million small businesses worldwide. 

You don’t need to be a tax accountant to keep your small business bookkeeping organized. Create, send, and track invoices from viewed to paid. Access accounting solutions to know where your money is going. Plus, see where your business stands with financial reports. Small business accounting is easy with QuickBooks cloud accounting software. Our bookkeeping services make it effortless to stay on top of your business on the go. The Quickbooks Accounting app is here to make the life of every small business owner easier.

Tracking mileage automatically

Automatically track your business mileage using your phone’s GPS, without draining your phone’s battery.

Swipe to mark trips as business or personal to maximize your mileage tax deductions.

Dashboard business insights

Check your profit and loss to know what you’re making and spending, plus view your account balances.

Easily track your expenses by category so you know exactly where your money goes.

See your open and overdue invoices at a glance for easy cash flow analysis.

Create invoices and get paid faster

The invoice generator lets you send and manage invoices in multiple currencies so you always know who owes you and who paid you.

Get paid faster by credit card or bank transfer (requires a QuickBooks Payments account).

Manage payments, track sales and customers on the go

Get maximum tax savings by scanning receipts and attaching them to your expenses.  

Stay up to date on your profit and loss by connecting your bank accounts. Track finances and manage payments quickly and with ease.

Review your bank transactions and add them to your accounting records with a tap.
Easily add your customers so you can keep in touch with them on the go.

Do even more with online accounting

Customize your invoices and sales receipts with your logo, colors, and custom fields in minutes. 

Be prepared for tax time and get all the tax deductions you deserve by giving your tax accountant access to your QuickBooks data.

Add more tools with over 80 partner apps, including inventory management and advanced CRM, by going to apps.intuit.com

It’s easy to get started

Already using QuickBooks Online? Download the world’s #1 accounting app, sign in with your QuickBooks user ID and password, and enjoy the QuickBooks Accounting app for free!

New to QuickBooks Online? Download the app, create an account, and try QuickBooks free for 30 days! There’s no credit card required and no obligation to purchase.

Your free trial includes unlimited access to QuickBooks on the web and all your mobile devices. 

Not compatible with QuickBooks Desktop for Windows or Mac.

#1 Accounting Software for Small to Midsize Businesses
*Based on PCMag, as of November 2019

From INTUIT

Makers of QuickBooks Online, GoPayment, QuickBooks Payroll, TurboTax, and Mint.com

Visit:
https://security.intuit.com/privacy to learn how Intuit protects your privacy.
https://qbo.intuit.com/c1/Terms_Of_Service.html to read the Intuit terms of service.

Download today and start managing your small business easily on the go.

recentChanges: Thanks for using QuickBooks. We update our app regularly to improve performance, fix bugs and add new features so that you'll always know where your business stands.
comments: Whatever you do do NOT sign up or create a subscription through the app or the Google Play Store - you have no ability to manage your subscription or upgrade your account through the app and quickbooks customer support is unable to help or change settings as well. I am very competent with navigating apps and I can say with 100% confidence this is on the app developers at this point - extremely frustrated and unhappy with the app

It's amazing how far behind the times this company is. The only way my bank will allow me to link to Quick Books is by using my routing and account number, but QB doesn't know how to do it that way. This is crazy! So I need to switch banks just so I can link my expenses with QB. What a pain in the ass.

6.10.19 - i hate it. you can't do "billable" expenses from the app. you cant edit invoices that have been sent. terrible. i hate it. 8.12.19 - still hate it. noone has "investigated"my situation. 👎👎 12.5.19. yup.. still hate it. I use it but cringe every single time I open it. POS app. 1.3.20 still hate it no "billable button". Zero stars 3.5.20. still hate it. Zero stars

Tried to open an account, somehow ended up opening 2 separate ones. Cancelled my subscription but has still charged for the 2 accounts for over 2 months. Absolute shambles. I tried to use the one account that I actually wanted but had absolutely terrible service off the helpline, nobody knew what to do. Shocking.
paying $20 a month for an app that keeps crashing that rely on for our business is nerve wrecking. please fix asap. Have tried app from two different computers to make sure it wasn't from my end.

title: Buffer: Social Media Manager
description:
Save time and manage all your social media in one place. Buffer is a simpler way to schedule posts and track the performance of your content on Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, Pinterest and LinkedIn.

No more wasting time, no more logging into multiple social accounts. Any link, text, picture or video - just add it to Buffer and you can quickly choose when and where it’ll be posted.

Why you'll love Buffer:

- Share to multiple Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, Pinterest and LinkedIn and accounts from one place.
- Maintain a consistent presence on social media, so you can build your following and influence.
- Get easy-to-read analytics for every update you share.
- Schedule your posts automatically so you never have to worry about setting a time and date, or customize the timing of individual posts. Scheduling has never been easier or more flexible.
- Share from all of your favourite apps. Including scheduling native retweets from most Twitter apps!
- Never run out of amazing content with Instagram Reposting.
- Get world class support from your friends at Buffer.

You can also add to Buffer from your favourite browser using our Browser Extensions for Safari, Chrome, Firefox and Opera.


Privacy Policy: https://buffer.com/privacy
Terms of Use: https://buffer.com/terms

Do you have any questions for us?
Email: hello@buffer.com
Twitter: @buffer
Facebook: http://facebook.com/bufferapp
Instagram: @buffer
Pinterest: https://www.pinterest.com/bufferapp/

recentChanges:
Hey there great news: we've added a few fixes :) Now you can schedule to your heart's desire!

In this update:

• Improve styling consistency throughout app
• Fix snackbar crash occuring for IG reposts
• Fix incorrect UI state when switching profiles

We value your feedback, so if you have something to share then email us at hello@buffer.com.
If you're enjoying our app, please leave us a rating and a review!
comments: Used to be good but now I had to do manual post everytime! Back then we'd be directed instantly to pre-post page with pics and caption already on their places. All we had to do was click "Post" and it's done. Now, even the images sometime did not appear. Let's say I was about to post 3 photos in one (slideshow) post. The image appear on my device will be only the 3rd! Where did 1 and 2 go?? Anyway. Won't recommend this anymore. What a disappointment.

Can't upload videos when creating post. Doesn't matter where the video comes from or which app I used to edit or create it. I either get a bad read file error or read interrupted error. All support can tell me to do is uninstall the app and reinstall it, and close other apps that are running at the same time. For real? PS I'm using Google pixel 3

Won't let me create an account. Keeps giving me the error msg "whoops! There was a problem with your request, please try again.". I triple checked that I filled out everything correctly and met the requirements...
Nice app. Easy to schedule your posts Will always recommend to my friends. However it is suggested that it should be completely free to access.
Great at what it does. Allows custom scheduling for a number of social media platforms with a simple and straightforward interface.

title: UpKeep Maintenance Management
description:
UpKeep is the #1 group collaboration and productivity application for maintenance and facility management teams. UpKeep allows you to snap a picture of a broken piece of equipment, create a work order, and schedule it for repair - all from a mobile device. We have 50,000+ app downloads and over 30,000 businesses that rely on us, 200,000 users, millions of work orders created, and hundreds of companies signing up for UpKeep every single day.

Sign Up Today For A Free Account! 

UpKeep is perfect for facility, property, restaurant, and manufacturing managers looking to improve communication by enabling real-time status updates for your team. It is a modern, intuitive, and customizable CMMS proven to expedite task management and workflow processes.
­
-Add co-workers and easily assign work orders to different users
-­Create, update, and check status of work orders and tasks
-­Manage a history of your assets
­-Receive notifications to your phone and email
­-Organize reports
­-Enable UPC Label scanning
­-Develop assets and assign work orders to assets
­-Sync across all devices you own
-Web application available for use on any device
-Create preventative and scheduled maintenance
-Customize work orders using form items

Upkeep is the only mobile­ first Enterprise Asset Management (EAM)/Computerized Maintenance Management System (CMMS) tool in the market. While traditional EAM software relies on written forms and manual input, UpKeep revolutionizes the enterprise sector with an intuitive user experience. We hope to empower businesses with the full potential of the mobile device — saving time, costs, and stress.

UpKeep is ideal for maintenance crews who constantly work at different sites. With UpKeep, technicians can spend more time in the field and less time retyping data or traveling between locations — thus resulting in higher quality data, more thorough analysis, and more robust asset evaluation.

Businesses that UpKeep empowers
-Facilities Management
-Property Management
-Manufacturing
-Hospitality
-Schools
-And more! 

*You can download and use UpKeep free of charge on our demo plan without a credit card. Continued use will require a paid subscription.

Download today and discover why no other project management app can keep up with UpKeep

Visit us on the web at:
www.onupkeep.com

For questions and/or support you can email us at (we tend to respond within the hour):
info@onupkeep.com


Sign Up Today For A Free Trial!

comments: It takes so lo g to do anything in this app. Here are the issues with just typing. Randomly skipping to the beginning of the work order. Randomly deleting everything you have typed in. Randomly disconnecting while typing and booting me out when I am connected to a wifi and standing still. Randomly deciding to not add photos until the app is uninstalled and reinstalled. Randomly clearing the signature pad. And trust me when I say "randomly".
I installed it and set up my info and now says " oops I think your session has,expired" extremely frustrating!!!! I need this to work to get an issue fixed up my job. Thank you

I used to have nothing but great things to say about upkeep! However, after waiting weeks for simple glitches to be fixed, and always being blamed for the problem, I have grown tired of their lack of customer service/support. I will not recommend this service any more. Medium sized company (over 100 employees) Using the upkeep system for almost 2 years Paid subscription Reply- I have contacted upkeep but to no avail. This issue still has not been resolved.

UpKeep has completely changed our maintenance department! All of my guys are on the same page, we have a searchable record of all maintenance requests/repairs, and our efficiency has improved exponentially.
Doesn't keep the filters that you set, locks up when typing in certain fields. Find myself closing out the app and restarting it to get it to work.

title: Tour Manage
description:
Tour Manage is build for tour leaders to help them better manage their tour groups. 

Tour leaders that are invited by their tour operators or destination management companies can receive information about the trips they lead in the app, and, if needed can, contact the tour operator for support while on the road.

Tour leaders can download documents pertaining to the trip and see contact information about the bus driver that is assigned to the trip.

A chat conversation is available for tour leaders to contact the support center of their tour operator.

Currently, tour leaders that work with Miki Travel Asia can be invited. More tour operators and destination management companies will follow. Please stay tuned for more functionally that will help tour leaders better manage their trip.

A chat conversation is available for tour leaders to contact the support center of their tour operator.

Currently, tour leaders that work with Miki Travel Asia can be invited. More tour operators and destination management companies will follow. Please stay tuned for more functionally that will help tour leaders better manage their trip.
